Ini Hal-hal yang Langsung Dipelajari Wishnutama Usai Dilantik
05 Nov 2019, 18:00 by Afif Farhan


Menparekraf Wishnutama dan wakil menteri Angela Tanoesoedibjo. (Foto: Afif Farhan/detikcom)

FOKUS BERITA
Duet Wishnutama-Angela TanoeJakarta - Menteri Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif (Menparekraf) Wishnutama mengaku dirinya langsung belajar setelah dilantik. Dari soal pariwisata, ekonomi kreatif, dan destinasi prioritas.Dalam acara Ngopi Bareng Mas Tama dan Mbak Angela yang digelar Kementerian Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif di M Bloc Space, Jakarta Selatan, Selasa (5/11/2019), Menparekraf Wishnutama dan wakilnya, Angela Tanoesoedibjo, bertemu dengan puluhan media nasional."Beberapa hari setelah dilantik, kami belajar dulu. Mempelajari secara internal apa sih yang bisa kita perbuat, apa sih potensinya," katanya membuka perbincangan.Wishnutama menyinggung soal pariwisata dan ekonomi kreatif. Menurutnya, dua hal tersebut saling melengkapi satu sama lain."Kami melihat bahwa ekonomi kreatif akan dipusatkan di berbagai macam nilai tambah melalui berbagai strategi seperti branding, inovatif, penguatan rantai pasar, dan usaha kreatif. Begitu juga dengan pariwisata," paparnya."Ekonomi kreatif itu men-support pariwisata dan sebaliknya. Saling mendukung dan memperkuat satu sama lain," lanjut Wishnutama.Secara spesifik menyoal Badan Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif (Bekraf) yang sebelumnya berdiri sendiri, Wishnutama menjelaskan kondisi saat ini akan mempermudah dalam mengeksekusi kebijakan. Tentu, juga untuk mencapai target-target."Kita punya badan yang membawahi pariwisata dan ekonomi kreatif, untuk melakukan eksekusi juga bisa dalam tugas-tugas ke depan," jelasnya.Wishnutama pun menegaskan, Kemenparekraf bakal lebih banyak bersifat sebagai koordinator. Sebab, ada kementerian lain yang juga menunjang pariwisata."Kalau bangun jalan itu kita minta ke Kementerian PUPR, untuk tiket pesawat ke BUMN dan Kementerian Perhubungan. Kita terus berkoordinasi untuk membangun destinasi wisata," pungkasnya.Simak Video "Tak Hadiri Wisuda Putrinya karena Pelantikan, Wishnutama Minta Maaf"[Gambas:Video 20detik](aff/krs)

These Things Are Directly Learning Wishnutama After Inauguration
05 Nov 2019, 18:00 by Afif Farhan


Menparekraf Wishnutama and deputy minister Angela Tanoesoedibjo. (Photo: Afif Farhan / detikcom)

NEWS FOCUS
Wishnutama-Angela Tanoe duet Jakarta - Minister of Tourism and Creative Economy (Menparekraf) Wishnutama claimed he immediately learned after being inaugurated. From the matter of tourism, creative economy, and priority destinations. In the Coffee Cup event with Mas Tama and Mbak Angela, which was held by the Ministry of Tourism and Creative Economy at M Bloc Space, South Jakarta, Tuesday (11/05/2019), Menparekraf Wishnutama and his representative, Angela Tanoesoedibjo, met with dozens of national media. "A few days after being inaugurated, we studied first. Studying internally what we can do, what is its potential," he said, opening the conversation. Wishnutama touched on the subject of tourism and the creative economy. According to him, the two things complement each other. "We see that the creative economy will be centered on a variety of added values through various strategies such as branding, innovative, strengthening the market chain, and creative endeavors. Likewise with tourism," he explained. creative supports tourism and vice versa. Mutually supporting and reinforcing one another, "Wishnutama continued. Specifically questioning the previously independent Tourism and Creative Economy Agency (Bekraf), Wishnutama explained the current conditions would make it easier to execute policies. Of course, also to achieve targets. "We have a body that oversees tourism and the creative economy, to carry out the execution can also be in the tasks ahead," he explained. Wishnutama also emphasized, Kemenparekraf will be more as a coordinator. Because, there are other ministries that also support tourism. "If we build the road, we ask the Ministry of PUPR, for plane tickets to SOEs and the Ministry of Transportation. We will continue to coordinate to develop tourist destinations," he concluded. , Wishnutama Apologize "[Gambas: 20sec video] (aff / krs)
